website_summaries.verdict: This steamer is perfect for traveling but is more expensive than steamers with similar abilities.
pros: This lightweight, compact steamer does not leak and is easy to fill, heating up in less than a minute
cons: It has a tendency to sometimes spit hot water

customer_reviews.title: This little guy heats up SUPER fast and steamed out all of the wrinkles in ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly, this tiny little thing packs a punch! I got this because I'm getting married in a week and we are traveling with the groomsmen's suits and needed a steamer to get those wrinkles out. To test the steamer, I took it to an old bridesmaids dress that I had laying at the bottom of my closet. This little guy heats up SUPER fast and steamed out all of the wrinkles in a very short time. I was on a roll so i steamed all of my curtains and a few other dresses. I am so impressed that something so small is so effective. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product! I really love it and I hate to iron. I couldn't stop using it this weekend and am actually enjoying experimenting with it. It takes a little while to get the hang of it and I had to ask a couple of questions (about whether or not to hold it on the fabric or away from it). But it's really done the trick. I'm so pleased and wish I had thought to order this earlier. I even gave my iron and ironing board away this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi18

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer
customer_reviews.text: Love this little steamer! Worked great on two sets of curtains that had been in storage for some time and were very wrinkled. Had to refill twice with each set of curtains but wasn't a negative as water heated very quickly. I travel a lot and this will definitely be coming with me as it is small enough to pack away. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: draggonfly

customer_reviews.title: It's small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is great - it heats up quickly and gets the job done. It would be great for travel. It doesn't take much to use the water in the well. I was steaming two items which required a second refill. I really like the product and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as magical as expected.
customer_reviews.text: You can normally get two shirts taken care of with one fill. Unlike the videos, this product either doesn't get hot enough to get the wrinkles out or steam just isn't that amazing. You still need to stretch the garment while you are steaming it to remove the wrinkles which can prove challenging as you only have one free hand. 4 stars because its definitely no worse than an iron, but I can't say its any better!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product..!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product..! My wife order it because of the great reviews. When it arrive I was a little worried because the product was small and that it wouldn't work.. but I was wrong. It works great, it's heats up quickly.. works get on my dress shirts and suit pants.. happy with the product.. wish it was a little bit bigger but for the prices and the size it's a great product..!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this portable steamer. It is a great alternative to dragging out the old ironing board and iron. I use it often. I previous owned a very large and expensive steamer. It was a pain to use and store so I rarely bothered with it and eventually trashed it. This little steamer stores easily and is so easy to use. My purchase experience was perfect and I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work :( Spills too much water
customer_reviews.text: I received it a couple of days ago and I was excited to use it. After turning it on, I waited a couple of minutes and it started to heat up. Once it was ready I tried using it but it was spilling too much water and not enough steam. I tried a few more times with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Okay steamer
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used this steamer and it's okay. It does get most of the wrinkles out. The first time I used it, I had to go over my shirt a few times because the wrinkles were not disappearing right away. Also, the steam was not consistent. There would be times where the steam would stop flowing, but there was plenty of water still in the tank. I would let the steamer sit for a few seconds to let it reheat and then continue steaming my shirt. Overall, I would say that this steamer is okay for using on casual wear that you wouldn't mind a few wrinkles on.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Kekahuna

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product because it had so many positive reviews. I have tried to use it on 3 different shirts multiple times and it does not come close to removing the wrinkles. Not even able to attempt to wear the shirts after using this because of the wrinkles left in them. Very disappointed because it is not what I was expecting at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: I was not very impressed with this steamer. Didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not very impressed with this steamer. Didn’t get the wrinkles out as I had hoped. And you have refill often. Within 10 min. Or 3 shirts worth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and portable
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very quickly and produces a moderate amount of steam. I've found that you must steam the clothing on a hanger, then lay it down and smooth out the wrinkles with your hands. The reservoir is small, so I usually have to refill it after only one or two garments. This is not a problem, though, because it is ready to steam again in just a minute or two. Small and portable. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: sherrie andrus

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the job as stated. I tried it ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do the job as stated. I tried it on silk, rayon and linen , didn't remove wrinkles and left water marks. I made my purchase based on customer reviews. Must have been paid reviews. I will stick to my steam iron, not throw it away as one customer claims she did.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen heiss

customer_reviews.title: Pax Clothes Steamer is so great and practical
customer_reviews.text: Pax Clothes Steamer is so great and practical. Its functionality and size make it even greater, can be stored practically anywhere and even taken on trips. Does a fine job of straightening my close and within minutes. I would definitely recommend this product to my friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H

customer_reviews.title: Works well, super service from merchant
customer_reviews.text: Great service from the Seller, who quickly reached out after the first unit did not work. Replacement unit works great: lighter weight fabrics are done very quickly, heavier fabrics take a little more time..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest little device to use ever! All you do is take off the top, fill the container with water, wait a minute for it to heat up (you can see it boiling), and as soon as some steam comes out of the opening you're good to go! I live alone so there is no need for me to buy a regular steamer AND a travel size steamer. I bought this after using a friend's on vacation and it's probably one of the best purchases I've made all year. This product is amazing and super easy to use! Thank you for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful  little steamer. Light weight. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the streamer primarily to steam hanging curtains. Took a while but did the job. If it does as good a job on my t-shirts, I'll be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Steam power wasn't nearly strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly strong enough to remove wrinkles from a quilt. I bought this steamer to smooth out quilts so I could photograph them, and was very disappointed on two counts: first, the steamer had a pretty short power cord and had to be attached to the cord while it was in use. This really restricted freedom of movement while steaming. Second, the steam power was weak and didn't even make a dent on the wrinkles in my quilts. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Get the Wrinkles Out
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The Pax Steamer is easy to fill, heats up quickly and gets the wrinkles out fast. Must be held upright at all times! Awesome for traveling, compact and lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: David Murphy Jr

customer_reviews.title: time-saver in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I hate ironing and this lets me get ready in the morning really quickly. It heats up fast and I can have wrinkle free clothes in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Happy With This Little Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this steamer based on positive reviews,and it has not disappointed me.I took it along on a trip in a fully packed suitcase with clothes I planned on wearing to a wedding and other related events.I rolled the clothing rather than packing them to minimize wrinkles,but there were still noticeable wrinkles in almost every item.The PAX steamer easily and quickly removed the wrinkles.Since then I have used it at home, and I am very satisfied.It is light-weight,easy to fill,heats up fast,and the cord is a great length.The price was reasonable,too.
customer_reviews.author: jmhc

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an installation of Cornice boards. They were a soft Roman Shade pleat and we knew that during the trip they night wrinkle. I used this steamer not only to remove wrinkles but also to level out any slight unevenness in a pleat. It heats up in seconds and is lightweight, which is critical when you are on a ladder! Now I use it for everything,
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Handy little steamer. Easy to use and works well. I bought it to try before taking it on a trip. I used it on some clothes that were purchased on line and when taken out of their plastic wrappers, had lots and lots or wrinkles and creases. Really worked well on those, so it should not have any problem getting wrinkles out from just being in a suitcase. Learned not to fill to the max line, cause at a certain point it can spit water. However, even that isn't a real issue. It's also very light weight. Another plus!
customer_reviews.author: leeryder

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product :)
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time buying a steamer online, Im surprised by how compact yet powerful this thing is! It works just like advertised, no water spitting, no damage on delicate clothes,silk, really works on any types of fabric! Not sure if I want to use the steamer for my plush to kill germs.. id rather not use it for it because the steam makes it moist. ANYWAYS!! Im very happy with my purchase, they are the kind of people you can trust to buy from... Thank you PAX! Im very glad I go it from you :)
customer_reviews.author: jjj

customer_reviews.title: Useful item
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what I expected, but this steamer works really well in getting out some wrinkles that I had been unable to get out by traditional means (tossing in dryer). I’m not that great with this iron and this steamer doesn’t come with instructions (do you touch the clothes, not touch the clothes) so it gets a 4 because it’s not dummy proof.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Vervitsiotis

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have many clothes than need ironing but when I do have something that’s wrinkled I’d rather just quickly steam it. This product is perfect for that. It’s great for traveling, small and heats up very quickly. Worked on the most stubborn silk blend shirt that refused to dewrinkle even with an iron!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!  Fast, efficient, easy to use -
customer_reviews.text: I ought this and had it shipped out of state, for us to use before our son's wedding; I knew we'd need it to rejuvenate our wedding clothes, once we unpacked. It worked perfectly, and ended up being used not just on our clothes - but also by the bride and bridesmaids' dresses. Of course we left the steamer for our son & his wife, when we left Texas - and since then, it's been used for drapes and curtains in their new homes. We'd recommend this product in a heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel, but takes longer to steam clothes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is super convenient and easy to use! It works wonders on your clothes! However, I wish the cord was able to detach as it would be easier to fill it up with water, also occasionally when I am using it on my clothes, it takes a couple of pauses where it does not work. It is not consistent in applying steam to your clothes so it takes a little longer to steam your clothes also because the nozzle is smaller than a typical steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: WOW.... What a powerful steamer in a small package. I bought this travel steamer for my up coming vacation. As soon as it arrived I tried it out on two of my husband's very wrinkled shirts...amazing! They looked freshly laundered. Easy to fill, use and done in no time at all.....just follow the easy to understand instructions. I will be using the streamer everyday over a three week period on vacation. In the new year I will update my review as far as dependability, quality and longevity of the steamer. For now I am happy to rate with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bhtubby

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this steamer. It worked the first time, but the second time it spit a lot of hot water all over my clothes and floor until I unplugged the steamer. It did not remove the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Rebdan

customer_reviews.title: but it’s easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I thought, but it’s easy to use. I only waited one minute to get hot. Good for travel and one shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Cola Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LIGHTWEIGHT, EFFECTIVE STEAMER!
customer_reviews.text: The last time I ironed was 40 years ago. I've tried several "anti-wrinkle sprays"... some work reasonably well, many don't. THIS IS SOOO EASY AND EFFECTIVE!! It's just like ironing without the hassle of pulling out an ironing board. It's small enough to be lightweight so you don't get tired if you "fake iron" 10+ items at a time, but has a big enough base to fill enough water to do them all without refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover from HB

customer_reviews.title: No Strength adjustments/levels or choices!
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay but I was expecting more. I wish it had a adjustment button or dial so I could select a strength. It doesn’t have a on/off button either. You just plug it in and wait for water to boil and steam to come out. As I had mentioned because there’s no dial or buttons to select strength the steam just comes out at one level. There have been several times where I wish I could turn the level up so it blows out with stronger force. Something as simple as 3 basic levels of low/medium/Maximum would be a great improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Spits water 💦
customer_reviews.text: Steamer is great when it’s not spitting out water when I’m trying to use it. It did not do this the first 3-4 times, but then it started. I never fill it above the line, I always make sure the cap is on right and I’ve tried holding it at different angles (straight up/tilted). I’m starting to think it’s not an operator error. I gave 3 stars just in case it is. This is def. a good travel size. One fill to the line is enough to do a medium size wrinkled shirt.
customer_reviews.author: ASH

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest, i love this product. I have researched proper way to use this type of product, and the product works beautifully. Each cloth, shirt or tshirts, takes less than 1 minutes. A dress or longer garments takes less than 2 minutes. Tips: 1. Dont fill with water passed the max line. Works perfectly if filled just below the line. 2. Only use bottled water. One 16 fl. Oz bottle can fill the steamer 4 to 5 times. 3. Go up and down on one spot twice and that area is done. 4. Dont open the top to refill while it is powered on.
customer_reviews.author: Shona-z

customer_reviews.title: Small but leaks and doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted 9 months. It can steam pretty quickly but you have to be vertical otherwise it will drip water out - this is probably true for other steamers as well. The problem with this unit is that it started leaking red liquid from the bottom that got onto my clothes and sheets. At 9 months of very infrequent use, this was disappointing. The plus is it’s size in case you need to take it on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Shogeki

customer_reviews.title: Cool off element between refilling.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little frustrated. After the initial filling of water ran out and I put more in it kept spitting water out everywhere. It took me a few minutes to realize that the heating element needed to be cooled off before it could be used again. So I kept putting cold water in it and pouring it out in between each steaming to cool the element down. About four times I think. It doesn’t take long to heat back up. After doing that it worked great and steamed the clothes perfectly. Some of them were very delicate fabric too. I recommend this steamer as long as you follow what I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product! It’s actuall fun watching how fast the water boils. I feel the max water line is a bit high so,to be safe, underfill it and be prepared to refil more frequently. I actually use it to refresh my curtains periodically. It’s time consuming but rewarding. It’s actually better than any stand steamer I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This little steamer is amazing. Very simple to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: This little steamer is amazing. Very simple to use and works great. It will be convenient for traveling, as it is small. Holds enough water to steam two or three articles of clothing. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ruarkj

customer_reviews.title: I love my little steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love my little steamer! At first I was skeptical about the effectiveness but it did its job! It's lightweight and easy to use. It only takes a minute to start steaming and it doesn't soak your clothes while using it. It holds enough water to use for a garment or two. It's compact design is great for storage and traveling purposes. Very pleased with the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Olivares

customer_reviews.title: No more ragamuffin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer when my family scheduled a cruise. Iamnot a great packer. This steamer is perfect for me. I love it. Read the instructions once and you’re ready to go. Packs easily. Gets rid of the wrinkles Always test the fabric before going full force. I used it onsilk, cotton, cotton-blends, polyester-really on everything that needed pressing. The only difficulty I had was getting the nozzle off the steamer to empty the water after it had cooled down. In spite of that I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect job!  I'm buying more for gifts, great product!
customer_reviews.text: This does a perfect job, easy to aim and steam. It made our vacation a snap, cloths always looked great even after 3 days in a suitcase. I will never travel without this steamer. I use it at home in place of my iron - my teens can now do their own steaming with out worrying about burning themselves or their cloths. I plan on buying several more for gifts this year. Pax Clothes Steamer - #1 in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny steamer packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I first took it out of the box because it was smaller than I had anticipated. This tiny steamer packs a punch! Worked great traveling and getting all the wrinkles out of shirts and dresses. This little steamer worked faster and better than the full size steamer I use to have that cost 4X more. Very simple to use, just be sure to follow instructions and keep steamer upright.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee M.

customer_reviews.title: It's not always about size.......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer. Heats up really fast, does a really great job. I was skeptical to order this due to it's small size. Was I wrong! This thing does exactly what it is supposed to do. I prefer this over my old large steamer due to ease of use and practicality. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use and you could not tell the difference ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Before Christmas her husband needed to steam a suit and did not have time to send it to the cleaners. I got the handheld steamer out and gave it to him as an early Christmas gift. It worked perfectly. It was easy to use and you could not tell the difference between the results he got with the steamer and those of professional services. I would highly recommend this product. I am thinking of getting one for my own use.
customer_reviews.author: gw77

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get a single use
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it one star because it's not possible to give it less. It took six weeks to be shipped to an APO, got lost in transit at some point, and when it finally arrived, the box was crushed and the steamer was out of. Both the box and steamer were packaged in a separate bag. I turned it on for the first time and it heated up for about five seconds. The heating element immediately burned itself out and died. I didn't even get one use out of the thing. It'll cost me more than the thing is worth to ship it back from overseas so it looks like PAX just beat me for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for me. It's a lot more convenient for me than the bigger ones that roll around on the floor with the hanging rod. It's small, I can keep it out of the way, doesn't take very long to start steaming, great price, more than enough use time. I only steam 1 tshirt or maybe a pair of pants at a time so I really don't need a huge reservoir. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Very Portable and Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I like that this steamer is small and easy to travel with. Also, it helps to get the wrinkles out of some shirts that I've had to iron in the past. I like having an easier way to "spiff up" my shirts. Another feature that I like is that this steamer is so easy to fill with water. The water reservoir is big enough that you can fill it easily and not have water spilling over.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works very well and heats up really quick. You can use regular tap water instead of distilled, which is a plus. I ordered one for my daughter and before I gave it to her I had to use it. I was getting ready for church and noticed my top looked a little wrinkled and I did not want to take the time to get out the iron & ironing board, so I grabbed her steamer. I loved it! Worked so good that I ordered one for myself! Good fast service!
customer_reviews.author: E.. Riley

customer_reviews.title: not good for travel
customer_reviews.text: i purchased one of these years ago and then got another for my son to take abroad. when we visited him, we discovered it wasn't compatible with an adapter and both of his and mine blew out. the company kindly replaced one of them and told me it wasn't meant for adapters and needed a converter. i had missed that part :( well, on another trip this month, i came prepared with a converter and, guess what? the steamer blew again. at home, it did the job for light/medium wrinkles and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: joan b giterman

customer_reviews.title: Great little steamer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little steel-size steamer. After having enough of clothes irons that leak and I have also burned nice clothing, I decided to try a steamer. I started with a travel-size first (and I do travel a bit). I love this steamer. Very effective. I will get a full-size one now for the house.
customer_reviews.author: bodenhome

customer_reviews.title: Smallest steamer, perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect size for travel. Does not take up much space at all. I have tried most of the travel size steamers and this one is the most compact. It's smaller than any of the others. Once filled you can steam 2 pairs of pants without running out of steam.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a mess anymore
customer_reviews.text: I love this little steamer! It really motivates me to take the wrinkles out of my clothes since it's so easy to use. I hated taking out the iron and ironing board and this has just changed my life for the better. It's amazing what ironing your clothes will do for your life and self esteem. I feel more confident in my work clothes and more put together.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Raygoza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast and travel friendly wrinkle remover
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like/ know how to iron and don't wearing wrinkly clothes, this is the product for you. I used to always have wrinkly clothes up until I got the Pax Wrinkle Remover. In just a few minutes a garment is wrinkle free. It does not damage any type of clothing like irons do. The beast thing is that it's very easy to use, fast, super light weight and travel friendly. SUPER RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Espiritusanto

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was an overpriced teapot. It didn't steam my clothes any better than the $12 Walmart model.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorDiva

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Just not for me. Heats up quick but because of the small water container by the time its at full steam 1/4 of the water is gone. Had to fill 3 times to do a man's shirt. so now you have to un plug it. Go to the sink & fill it & wait for it to heat up again. Then you have to have a place to hang it. Steamer has to stay in upright position. Thought it would be quicker & easier than ironing my husbands dress shirts. Sadly its not. I'm returning it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have to drag out an ironing board and iron, every time something is wrinkled. It is a pain in the neck. I also like my T shirts to look crisp, and sometimes coming right out of the dryer, they still have some wrinkles. I decided to give the steamer a try, on two T shirts, and I couldn't believe how they came out, they looked great! This saves so much work, and when something is wrinkled in your closet, just take out the steamer. It says it lasts for 10 minutes, but it didn't for me, but it is no big deal, as I will just be using it for a few items as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Nightengale

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, simple and affective.
customer_reviews.text: This hand steamer worked very well. I needed something I could put in my luggage, was small and would travel well. This little guy is the winner! Went to NYC for 5 days and I used the steamer every day so I could be wrinkle free to start my day. I appreciate the appliance and will take and use it again. I would use it all the time at home but I already have a stand up steamer that I use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size steam head for clothing
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for delay.i am just returning from my trip out west and your steamer arrived the afternoon of the morning I left . I was hoping to bring it with me but due to our really crappy post office here in south Portland where at times the mail can come anytime between 9am and 7pm..but after trying it out in a wrinkled $150 Tommy Bahama silk shirt from my suit case I'm very pleased with it..quick heat up time and about 90 seconds to do a quick overall ..love it! P M Clark
customer_reviews.author: P M Clark

customer_reviews.title: So with that said I am pleased to say I am happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift. They used it the next day and were very excited how well it worked. So with that said I am pleased to say I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Callinan

customer_reviews.title: Very small yet effective
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly like expensive steamer. But as it is too small, you can only fill a cup of water into the steamer, it spills if you put much water. It can hurt so you should be very careful when using it. One cup of water can steam 1 top.
customer_reviews.author: Grace C

customer_reviews.title: WHY BUY A BIGGER ONE? IT'S PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't necessarily say that it was for traveling. One refill will take the wrinkles out of 3 or 4 entire outfits, and it's size and weight are perfect. Anything larger would be to heavy, and it heats up in 2 minutes. A very useful and convenient steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Mella

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Mighty, Fast & Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Small but mighty which is exactly what I wanted -- Doesn't take up much space in my suitcase/carry on which is great plus it doesn't leak at all which is rare in a steamer. Arrived fast and on time. Let my friends use it on vacay & they all asked for the link so they could buy their own... great as a gift, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A Good Solution For a Common Problem
customer_reviews.text: Do you like to iron? Do you like to wear creased clothing? Good, then you are a 16 year old boy. If not, I recommend this little steamer. It works like a charm. First I tried it on some curtains which were just out of the packaging and looking like balled up aluminum foil. Within about ten minutes, the curtains were wrinkle free and hanging nicely. I then went on a steaming spree and took care of several shirts I hadn't worn for months. Hurrah! "New" clothes to wear. I finally stopped, but if one had been available, I might have tried it on a Star Pei. Not really. I like dogs. Anyway buy this steamer and go crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wells

customer_reviews.title: this works out really nicely
customer_reviews.text: wish the tank was a little bit bigger, however it works out nicely especially when my husband doesn't care about wrinkles in clothes and its easy enough to run this over them and get them out within minutes. steam is super hot so be cautious with skin contact but otherwise works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It's tiny and heats up VERY fast!
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is very small, definitely small enough for travel. It heats up very fast. I didn't time it but I really didn't have time to do anything else before it was ready to go. It's easy to seal after you refill it. Just a quarter turn I believe so no annoying unscrewing and screwing the top.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Miles

customer_reviews.title: Pax Fabric Portable Steamer
customer_reviews.text: working on my MBA. This PAX fabric is a blessing my shirts, once I unpack, using my PAX fabric steamer my shirts look wrinkle free. This seller has a fantastic product and you will not be disappointed. I give this product a 5-star 'plus rating'.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer! Makes getting ready easier! I love how small it is and also how well it works. You gotta be careful with the stem once it gets going since it will burn. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never operated a steamer before so I didn’t have an expectation coming in other than it would remove wrinkles. I wouldn’t say it’s perfect (likely operator error) but it does a pretty dang good job. I’d recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive and easy way to remove wrinkles from clothes. I’m happy with the purchase and even happier not having to use an iron when I want wrinkles out of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: gray hair guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Steamer is awesome! My roommate liked it so much I'll probably buy her one for christmas. After I purchased the product online it came with a follow up email from the actual sellers letting me know it was on its way and they'd included a manual for the product as well. I haven't had any issues but I appreciate this effort. If I had any questions or if by chance the product lets me down in the future I have the option to email them directly. Good for everyday use and/or travel size!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Kato

customer_reviews.title: Mini Geyser
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few times we used it while traveling. Spouse suggested we move it into our bathroom so she could steam clothes while getting ready for work. The first time she tried it it was spitting water all over her and the clothes. I tried refilling and got the same results. Empties the reservoir in seconds spraying boiling water everywhere. Worthless and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: D. Beech

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer to steam stuff in college in place of an iron, and all I can say is: it does the job. It definitely steams and gets wrinkles out, and for a nice price. However, it smells and has a weird residue inside. I'm not sure if its because of tap water additives or what, but it is pretty gross. Also, it doesn't hold that much water and really easily spills, which is quite dangerous because it gets REALLY hot. Overall though, if you need a cheap steamer and aren't steaming a ton of clothes at once, its okay.
customer_reviews.author: Knight304

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for draperies and window treatments
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use on draperies that I make in my small business. Today was my first use of it after hanging a very large expanse of draperies in a client's home and it performed beautifully! Wrinkles quickly and completely disappeared and it's light design made it so easy to handle up and down a ladder. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Works well, see for yourselves.
customer_reviews.text: Finally tried this. It works surprisingly well. Heats up quickly and does a pretty good job of removing most wrinkles. I am including a video of the steamer in action. Shirt was just unpacked and I hit one side for ease of comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you downsize, sometimes you gotta iron out the wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I recently downsized from a house to a tiny one bedroom in the city. One closet...ugh. So I space saved all my winter clothes. Only thing when you retrieved the winter clothes everything was wrinkled. I chose to buy a steamer to rid my sweaters of wrinkles. IT worked like a charm. All the ratings were spot on. Only thing that would make it better would be a slightly bigger reservoir. However I guess It wouldn't be travel size. Good Job.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hodnett

customer_reviews.title: strange leak
customer_reviews.text: i really loved this product because its a fast, powerful steamer. theres not a huge tank for water but it lasts much longer than you'd expect. the small size is perfect for travellers or people with little shelf space. but lately its been leaking down the sides and spitting water droplets along with steam. maybe ive broken it, or maybe its a design flaw. either way, its a cute lil steamer with minimalistic design that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: dw

customer_reviews.title: Compact and perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I needed a steamer because I'm attending some events while travelling and this is the perfect on the go steamer. No splash back and just steam that makes blouses wrinkle free! The water does run out quickly do to the small amount you can put in but it's okay because you can just refill it. But it produces steam in seconds you don't even have to wait long!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kao

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I literally was ridiculously excited when my steamer came in. I don't dry my nice shirts, I hang them to dry. So i don't ever have time to iron, so i would never wear them. Well now, i can just plug in my steamer, and turn it on, and it's literally like magic. It also heats up pretty fast. It was a great buy over all.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Barrilleaux

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the first steamer I’ve had that got hot really fast and made my clothes wrinkle free. I’ve had many other steamers from different companies and this was the best one I’ve ever used! I used it on delicate materials as well and they came out like they just got dropped off by the dry cleaners! I would highly recommend this to anyone and everyone and would definitely buy it as a gift for all of my friends and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Liav Maregan orogold

customer_reviews.title: Cute but will croke in about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little guy until about a week ago when it didn’t turn on or function any longer.ive only used it for normal daily use. I have reached out to PAX about replacing the item since it’s definitely still under the 5-year warranty. I have received no information about replacing the item as it’s now defective. Love spending my money twice since I need a functioning steamer and I have to go buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this device once I learned to use it correctly. Make sure not to tip it at an angle or there will be a large amount of water on the clothing. I use this almost every day and it is so convenient! It heats up quickly and I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren MacShara

customer_reviews.title: Easily knocked the wrinkles out of my shirts I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes about a minute for steam and then you're ready to go! Easily knocked the wrinkles out of my shirts I used it on. Cap is easy to put on/take off. Simple to use. Remove cap, put in water, replace cap, turn on. Definitely will save me a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: greggtex

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much water I put in this thing splats water all over the clothes I'm trying yo steam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little steamer works great. Easy to add water and removes wrinkles quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: This little steamer works great. Easy to add water and removes wrinkles quickly without damaging clothes. Perfect for when I have a few wrinkles in clothes and don't want to set up my ironing board. Easy to pack on trips!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Goka

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easily fit in my suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this little steamer to take on a trip to our daughter's engagement party. It is small, basic, lightweight and easily fit in my suitcase. I used it on several items of clothing and it did a great job. Exactly what I was looking for. I am odering one for each of my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marquis

customer_reviews.title: drips unless held vertical
customer_reviews.text: Heats up very quickly but holds very little water. So within five minutes you are out of water. It steams nicely but must be held in a vertical position or it spills out water. I was hoping it would work more like an iron and could steam in both a vertical and horizontal position.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Adair

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd clothes steamer I've owned over the years and so far I am very happy with it. While it holds less water and therefore needs to be filled more often than my previous steamers, it is so easy to refill and so quick to heat up, that is not a problem. The on/off button is a big plus... seems obvious, but many steamers you just plug in and they are on automatically. It is also lightweight and comfortable to use. I can't speak yet to durability ... I've only had it for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Patti D

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing. Heats up a lot faster then the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. Heats up a lot faster then the instructions say. Gets the wrinkles out fast. It's become a part of my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Erin

customer_reviews.title: Updated review! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review!! This is NOT a good buy. Save your money. It heats up and “spits” water everywhere and makes a complete mess!!! After using for a few weeks, it got way worse. This gadget is good in a pinch. The water heats up quickly and is a good size for travel. It does “spew” water sometimes and on set-in wrinkles, takes a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Gargels got steam water when low on tap water
customer_reviews.text: This was a major disappointment. I really wanted this to work. The price was good and it should work fine if you use distilled water. I ended up buying a better one for traveling that recommended adding a little salt to each fill up if tap water. This thing butternut me when it gargled water when almost empty. Fill me once, you get sent back.
customer_reviews.author: aimee anthony smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT for multiple clothing items
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely portable however if you have something more than one shirt & skirt or more than one dress this is NOT what you're looking for. We bought this to steam a bride dress and 2 bridesmaids and it did NOT last to do all 3 simple dresses. It does continue to work after its cleaned out with cleaner after EACH garmet This will NOT steam more then 2 curtains without running cleaner thru it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little unit
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold much so don't let it burn the water. You must hold it upright at all times. This unit works for me but I don't have suits or working clothes to contend qwithq
customer_reviews.author: Mary Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: light weight and compact great for traveling, quick to steam
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this steamer after trying to steam a cashmere sweater with a steam mop. The process was awkward and did not rebase the wrinkles. Amazon had the PAX Steamer on a special sale and she bought it. I used it first on a badly wrinkled unpacked silk shirt, The PAX heated quickly and the wrinkles quickly disappeared. I was able to put the steam right next to the fabric for quicker results with no issues. My wife then used it on her cashmere sweater and had the same happy results. Great product and now we have a packable steamer that will be going with us on all our travels.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my new steamer. It is self-explanatory and very easy to use; it's exactly as described. The only criticism I have is that the text of the care and use directions is very small and hard to read, but other that, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: No frills, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: My first impression of the steamer was it seemed rather cheaply built. To be fair I bought the because it was the least expensive option. I use this while traveling to use instead of hotel supplied irons. I hang all my wrinkled clothes on the shower rod and am able to Steam everything in one go in about 5 minutes. The steamer is no frills with only an on/off switch, which is a plus to me.
customer_reviews.author: BaronL

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Steamer does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: The first product I recieved didnt work at all. I contacted the owners and without a question they sent me a new one. Great customer service. The product is OK. Great for travel- very tiny. I have to do one full refill of water per shirt. It does a good job ironing , but theres still some wrinkles left. Nothing will replace the old fashioned iron.
customer_reviews.author: Agata

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for the price. It heats up super quick and is small enough to travel with. I got mine over the weekend and used it yesterday for the first time. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk died after four steams.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little steamer for business business travel. The size was great because it was easy to pack and didn’t take up too much space. I used it approximately four times and generally, it did what it was supposed to do — get wrinkles out. The problems began when I packed the steamer for a week long cruise. It died. The light didn’t turn on, there was no steam, just a dead piece of plastic in my hand. I checked the switch and other electronics were charging just fine. To be certain, I brought it home to test once again. Fail. Pretty much a piece of junk that lasted a grand total of four steams.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this particular steamer because it had a 60 seconds to heat feature. I first review at it negatively because the directions say it’s two minutes to heat. After using it it does heat up in one minute. I like it very much. I think they need to change that directions
customer_reviews.author: Diane daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Pax steamer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little steamer! I’ve already done a bunch of tops and I’m really happy with this purchase. Of course you’ll have to refill the tank when doing several items at a time which is understandable. The customer service is also really impressive. The steamer is lightweight and gets the job done quick!
customer_reviews.author: ricki

product_meta.title: Pax Steamer For Clothes, Travel and Home Handheld Garment Steamer, 60 Seconds Heat-Up, Fabric Steamer With Automatic Shut-off Safety Protection, 140milliliter , White
feature_bullets: TECHNOLOGY LEADER - get newest portable steamer for clothes design include new nozzle design distributes steam powerfully and consistently to enjoy wrinkle-free. Its compact size and weight (1. 1 pounds) with high capacity of 140Ml made this clothes steamer perfect for travel, easily fit in suitcase.

EASY TO USE AND POWERFUL- easy fill water tank using one on/off switch, takes only 60 seconds heat-up handheld steamer and lasts up to 10 minutes of continuous steaming to emit wrinkle-busting perfectly.

SAFE TO USE - Automatic shut-off safety protection when unit gets too hot or too low in water. this clothes steamer is Safe to use on all types of clothes including household fabric like furniture upholstery, bedding, drapery and tablecloth. "USER MANUAL" included - please read it carefully for safety and perfect use. IMPORTANT: in case of water spurting out from the Nozzle while boiling, please use distilled water or pure water to prevent it.

TAKE IT WITH YOU WHEREVER YOU GO - Portable and small frame. Carry it with you anywhere, anytime! It is perfect for business trips, vacations, destination weddings, or any other place everywhere and anytime. Please use a transformer which can adjust voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

YOUR SATISFACTION IS ! - We believe in the quality of our steamer handheld, offering 30-day satisfaction and 2 year . For any issue with the steamer, please contact us and we will take care of it ASAP.
